bio: yeehaa is an ecosystem architect with a PhD in Philosophy. He's passionate about transforming education and knowledge sharing. As an entrepreneur, thinker, and coder, he founded Offcourse and created the Superconnectors event format. With experience in traditional and non-traditional academia, he advocates for impactful and inclusive internet. Currently based in Taipei, he focuses on bringing people together around common values and translating shared visions into effective ecosystems.
